# AkshaySrivastav

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Independent Security Researcher | Smart Contract Auditor | Top warden
[@code4rena](https://twitter.com/code4rena)

## Highlights

  * [Placed 1st in Code4rena Ondo Finance audit](https://github.com/code-423n4/2023-01-ondo-findings/blob/main/report.md#m-02-first-deposit-bug)

In this audit, I found 3 medium severity vulnerabilities, 1 of which was a
solo finding.

  * [Placed 2nd in Code4rena Chainlink audit](https://code4rena.com/contests/2023-05-chainlink-cross-chain-services-ccip-and-arm-network#top)

In this audit, I found 1 High severity vulnerability and 1 Medium severity
vulnerability

  * [Placed 5th in Code4rena Aragon audit](https://github.com/code-423n4/2023-03-aragon-findings/issues/129)

In this audit, I found 1 medium severity vulnerability.

## AkshaySrivastav's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=AkshaySrivastav&source=AkshaySrivastav-profile)

## About

Akshay is an independent security researcher who has found numerous critical
bugs in DeFi projects which could have resulted in major loss to the protocol
and its users.

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akshaysrivastv)
  * [Website](https://www.akshaysrivastav.com/)
